mapper.insert: insert into AC_PERSON (ID, P_FULLNAME, P_SEX, P_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, P_CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, P_PHONE, P_BIRTHDAY, P_NICKNAME, P_EMAIL, P_LAST_TIME, P_LAST_IP, P_REGISTERED_ADDRESS, P_REGISTERED_TIME, P_REGISTERED_IP, P_IMAGE, P_FORMER_PHONE,P_DEVELOP_01,P_IS_REGISTERED) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pCertificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCertificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pLastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pRegisteredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pRegisteredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pRegisteredIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pImage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pFormerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pDevelop01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pIsRegistered,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update AC_PERSON set P_FULLNAME = #{pFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_SEX = #{pSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, P_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #{pCertificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #{pCertificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_PHONE = #{pPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_BIRTHDAY = #{pBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_NICKNAME = #{pNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_EMAIL = #{pEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_LAST_TIME = #{pLastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_LAST_IP = #{pLastIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_REGISTERED_ADDRESS = #{pRegisteredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_REGISTERED_TIME = #{pRegisteredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, P_REGISTERED_IP = #{pRegisteredIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IMAGE = #{pImage,jdbcType=BIGINT}, P_FORMER_PHONE = #{pFormerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_DEVELOP_01 = #{pDevelop01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, P_IS_REGISTERED =#{pIsRegistered,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: ID, P_FULLNAME, P_SEX, P_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, P_CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, P_PHONE, P_BIRTHDAY, P_NICKNAME, P_EMAIL, P_LAST_TIME, P_LAST_IP, P_REGISTERED_ADDRESS, P_REGISTERED_TIME, P_REGISTERED_IP, P_IMAGE, P_FORMER_PHONE,P_DEVELOP_01,P_IS_REGISTERED
